official-title.#text:
To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the
			 Secretary of the Interior to participate in the design, planning, and
			 construction of the South Sacramento County Agriculture and Habitat Lands
			 Water Recycling Project in Sacramento County, California.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text: Authorization of Sacramento County, California, water reclamation project

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the
			 following new section:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act

header.#text: Sacramento County, California, water reclamation project

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, in cooperation with the Sacramento Regional County Sanitation District, California,
			 is authorized to participate in the design, planning, and construction of,
			 and land acquisition for, a project to reclaim and reuse wastewater in
			 accordance with

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:16__/ss:b

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall consist of three phases, the first of which shall
			 include the planning, design, and construction of water conveyance and
			 related infrastructure to provide recycled water to irrigate approximately
			 4,500 acres of land in southern Sacramento County.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:16__/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not exceed 25
			 percent of the total cost.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:16__/ss:a

text.#text: The Federal share of the costs of the project described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
determines
			 would contribute substantially toward the completion of the water
			 reclamation and reuse project, including—

text.#text: The non-Federal share may be in the form of any in-kind services that the

reasonable costs incurred by the Sacramento Regional County Sanitation District relating to the
			 planning, design, and construction of the water reclamation and reuse
			 project; and
the acquisition costs of land acquired for the project that is—

used for planning, design, and construction of the water reclamation and reuse project facilities;
			 and
owned by the Sanitation District and directly related to the project.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not provide funds for the operations and maintenance of the project described
			 in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:16__/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: There is authorized to be appropriated

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:16__

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by inserting after the last
			 item relating to

toc-entry.#text: Sec. 16__. Sacramento County, California, water reclamation project.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4266 IH: To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the design, planning, and construction of the South Sacramento County Agriculture and Habitat Lands Water Recycling Project in Sacramento County, California.
